title: Republish current draft app without code changes

requirements.text: Re-run the build and deploy/publish the currently deployed draft app to the Internet Computer without making any code changes (republish exactly as-is).

quotes: dont add anything new,just republish it

acceptanceCriteria: No source files (frontend or backend) are modified as part of this work.
A new deployment is produced from the current codebase and is accessible for preview/publishing.

constraints: Do not add any new features or UI changes; republish only.
Do not modify any existing source code; deployment must be from the current repository state.
